sentence.Network_en: The museum houses several of his Cubist masterpieces.
sentence.Network_cn: 博物馆收藏了他的几件立体派杰作。

sentence.Network_en: This cubist vision of the world introduced a new period in the history of art.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种对世界的立体感开创了绘画史上的一个新时期.

sentence.Network_en: By this time it was less easy to discern a single Cubist school.
sentence.Network_cn: 这时已不大容易识别出一个单独存在的立体学派.

entry.def: A Cubist is an artist who painted in the style of Cubism.
Cubist art is art in the style of Cubism.

example.tran: 毕加索影响深远的立体派画作《诗人》

means.word_mean: 1. an artist who adheres to the principles of cubism
1. relating to or characteristic of cubism;
